original_text: ‘Today and every day, I am God. If I hold you in my hand, nobody can take you away from my power. When I do something, nobody can change it.’ ‘Today and every day, I am God.
korean_text: 과연 태초로부터 나는 그이니 내 손에서 건질 자가 없도다 내가 행하리니 누가 막으리요

sentences.original_text: Today and every day, I am God.
If I hold you in my hand,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너를 내 손에 잡고 있으면,

sentences.original_text: nobody can take you away from my power.
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 내 권능에서 너를 빼앗아 갈 수 없다.

sentences.original_text: Today and every day, I am God.
